scheme.name: hdr-forward
scheme.description: HDR: Forward pass, mainly for transparent objects and other things that do not fit in the G-buffer.

scheme.name: hdr-envmap
scheme.description: HDR: Used for rendering to the environment map.

scheme.name: hdr-shadow
scheme.description: HDR: Used during the shadow mapping passes.

scheme.name: hdr-highlight
scheme.description: HDR: For rendering highlighted objects with the pick animation.
